sub_title: Founding Director at Organisation in Design and Joinanew, Expert and Coach in the field of Design and Creative Entrepreneurship, and board member Sisterhood in Business
summary:
I am the founding director of Organisation in Design. The initiator and one of the lecturers for our programme of masterclasses: Perspective in Design. And founder and art director of Ventura Projects, our former international design exhibition platform.

Designing is a creative and intuitive profession. My company interacts as a intermediary between the design world and other companies and institutions in order to advance and promote design world wide while protecting the creative process. 
Advancing design anyway possible. That is Organisation in Design

I developed Perspective in Design, an extensive programme of masterclasses in which the subtle art of creative entrepreneurship is taught on an individual basis. Organisation in Design has implemented their broad and year long expertise in the field of design in this practical programme geared towards design studios, labels and individual designers. The programme focuses on professionalism and growth and has been proven very successful.

I love taking part in advisory boards for companies and institutions such as CrowdyHouse, HKU University of the Arts Utrecht, the International Contemporary Furniture Fair (ICFF) New York and the Helsinki Design Week.  I'm a regular speaker for events and institutions such as the “Cultural Entrepreneurship Pilot” of the Creative Industries Fund, St Lucas School of Arts Antwerp, Nuova Accademia di Belle Arti (NABA) Milan. I often take part in jury or design panels for international renowned awards.

As an ambitious businesswoman, I am chairman and board member of the entrepreneurial network Sisterhood in Business, a strong national network of ambitious female entrepreneurs who use their experience, network and knowledge to guide businesses with growth ambitions.

I live and work in Utrecht, The Netherlands and graduated from Design Academy Eindhoven in 2000. I followed several business courses and personal development training in the past years.

Strengths: deep and complete comprehension of the inner workings of the creativity industry, art direction, connecting and mediation, consulting on design, entrepreneurship and always looking for innovation.

treasury_media.title: Margriet Vollenberg Corona Sessions
treasury_media.description: "ik geloof dat design deze wereld een betere plek maakt en dat ontwerpers een belangrijk onderdeel zijn van positieve verandering" (Margriet Vollenberg)

treasury_media.title: A talk with Margriet Vollenberg: her last goodbye to Ventura Projects
treasury_media.description: “The world where Ventura Projects was born doesn’t exist anymore ”, says the founder of the most popular section at Milan Design Week, explaining why she decided to shut it down, remembering the good old moments. Is this the end of a utopia?

treasury_media.title: Margriet Vollenberg | Judges | Dezeen Awards 2020
treasury_media.description: Margriet Vollenberg is the founder of Organisation in Design. After graduating from Design Academy Eindhoven, Vollenberg realised her strengths lay in creating connections between design, designers and potential markets.

treasury_media.title: Interview Margriet Vollenberg - Milan 2019
treasury_media.description: A decade in Milan for Margriet Vollenberg. In 2019, she celebrates that she set up both her office and Ventura Projects in Milan ten years ago. ‘The Netherlands was changing directions, we...

treasury_media.title: Ventura Future and Ventura Centrale return to this year's Milan design week
treasury_media.description: Ventura Projects has announced the return of the Ventura Future and Ventura Centrale exhibitions for Milan design week 2019.

treasury_media.title: Margriet Vollenberg and the future of Ventura Projects
treasury_media.description: The new design geographies (Milan, Dubai and New York) and the role of designers, “who ought to be mixed in with politicians”. We catch up with the Dutch designer, the mind and right arm of Ventura Projects.

treasury_media.title: Milano is the Capital of Design? Yes, but...
treasury_media.description: Margriet Vollenbgerg takes us to discover Ventura Centrale and Ventura Future among names, projects and places, and an exhortation for Milano

profile_positions.description:
If you're a designer, have completed your schooling, are an entrepreneur, have demonstrated you can practice as an independent business person whilst earning a living via your work, want to improve your skill set in order to advance your career and look to the future, then joinanew!

We help designers create successful businesses, from branding to billing and everything in between. Unlike the academic process, our sessions are written and illustrated to speak to a visually thinking audience.

Our approach covers all aspects of running a successful design business, including human resources, client management, product development, marketing, and licensing. This includes new content on social media, working from home, and understanding and working with different generations, all essential tools in today's ultra competitive marketplace.
Let’s rethink the business of creativity anew!
profile_positions.title: Founder joinanew

profile_positions.description: We are Certosa Initiative, and we are determined to show the transformative power of design. Join the Certosa Initiative and we’ll lead the bustle of the Milan Design Week to our fetching location in the up-and-coming Certosa District. We offer up a playground of 10.000 m2 for you to claim your stake, create your own project and show off your work to a crowd that prides itself on discovery. From emerging talents to established brands, the Certosa Initiative holds space for you!
profile_positions.title: Co-founder / Art Director

profile_positions.description:
At Organisation in Design we believe that design makes this world a better place and that designers are an important part of positive change.  Our international network is vast and diverse and we love to put it into action for high-end matchmaking that generates new collaborations, products and ideas. We bridge the gap between creative talent, design and business and we are dedicated to globally advancing, helping and promoting international contemporary design. 

Organisation in Design contributes to dozens of high-profile international events and Margriet Vollenberg has been invited as a curator, art director or lecturer for several internationally renowned design exhibitions, such as BIO.23, the 23rd Biennial of Design in Ljubljana, Slovenia, the Dutch Design Week in Eindhoven, the Netherlands, DesignMarch in Reykjavik, Iceland and the Helsinki Design Week in Finland.

Perspective in Design is the latest initiative and is a hugely effective programme of Masterclasses helping designers taking hold of their company, studio and design business. 

With inspiration sessions under the name; Touch Base, Organisation in Design initiates and curates virtual presentations of designers to the market.

Organisation in Design is the production company behind the Ventura Projects, a worldwide known exhibition concept for design which existed for over 10 years and ended in 2020. Over 7.000 designers, brands, academies and institutions in the field of design found their way to the market via the Ventura Projects exhibitions.

Helping and empowering our clients so they have every possibility and the capability to be successful in their work – and that means creating a whole new tomorrow for us all. 
Connecting and advancing for the creative industry. That’s Organisation in Design.
profile_positions.title: Founding Director

profile_positions.description: Perspective in Design is an extensive programme of masterclasses in which the subtle art of creative entrepreneurship is taught on an individual basis. Organisation in Design has implemented their broad and year long expertise in the field of design in this practical programme focussed towards design studios, labels and individual designers.
profile_positions.title: Initiator and Lecturer Perspective in Design

profile_positions.description:
Touch Base is an online matchmaking programme, curated by Organisation in Design.
The curated digital presentations and pitches from selected designers, under the name Touch Base, ensure inspiration which can lead to connections and collaborations. In this period where it can be difficult to find inspiration Touch Base was born.
The first edition took place in February 2020 in close collaboration with co-founder the Dutch Interior Institute, known as the NII.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder and Moderator of Touch Base
Curator In Bloom [Design exhibition at Market Art + Design]
Member Board of Advisors at CROWDYHOUSE [a premiere (launch) platform and marketplace for designers

profile_positions.description: Collaboration with Sarah K in curating the second survey exhibition of contemporary Australian and New Zealand design presented at Ventura Lambrate 2014 in Milan, April 2014 and at DesignEX 2014 in Sydney, May 2014.
profile_positions.title: Co-curator of The Other Hemisphere

profile_positions.description:
Fully revised the implementation and set-up of three of the four spaces within the Klokgebouw:
created a special presentation in Hall 1 at the Klokgebouw, titled Ode to the City. This presentation connected the exhibitions in the Klokgebouw with all the other exhibitions and events in the city of Eindhoven that together make DDW what it is.
The Composed Exhibition in Hall 2 gave way to over 50 up-and-coming designers and established names, presenting their designs in a democratic way. Various individual designers, design studios and collectives were also found in Hall 2, showing their latest designs in individual presentations.
Hall 3 was entirely dedicated to more than 30 labels, design studios and brands.
profile_positions.title: Art Director at Dutch Design Week

profile_positions.description:
Curated the main exhibition of the 23rd Biennial of Design (BIO). 
The selection of works of 100 designers from 27 countries shows how modern technologies, digitalisation and globalisation, as well as nature and its resources influence designers and their creative work. However the exhibition does not only expose the new and up-to-date ideas of contemporary design production, but also opens up a daring and critical cross section of everything that contemporary design reflects and describes in this very moment.
profile_positions.title: Curator at BIO 23, Biennial of Design

profile_positions.description: Foundation Sisterhood in Business is a national network organisation of female entrepreneurs who use their experience, network and knowledge to guide businesses with growth ambitions.
profile_positions.title: Bestuurslid

profile_positions.location: Milan, London, New York, Berlin, Courtrai, Dubai
profile_positions.description:
Ventura Projects are carefully curated design events in major design hotspots like Milan, London, New York, Berlin, Courtrai, and Dubai with a specific focus on international contemporary design.

The first self-initiated project was Ventura Lambrate in 2010. It started small with a 200m2 exhibition surface and 25 exhibitors, but increased rapidly to events with over 250 exhibitors on 30.000 square meters. After the first edition the Ventura Projects returned yearly to the capital of design during the Milan Design Week. Over 150.000 visitors were welcomed at Ventura Lambrate, Ventura Future, Ventura Academies and Ventura Centrale.

The Ventura Projects had many international exhibitions such as, Ventura Berlin in 2011, Ventura Interieur in 2012 & 2014, Ventura London in 2014 and Ventura New York in 2016, 2017 and 2019. the first edition of Ventura Centrale was in 2017 and in 2018 and 2019 it returned, every year more extensive with an increasing visitors flow. In 2018 also Ventura Dubai was launched and the year after the event returned to the Middle East. In 2019 Ventura New York X Colony was initiated at Colony New York, a result of a close collaboration between curators Jean Lin and Margriet Vollenberg.

The exhibitions of Ventura Projects, are flexible concepts which were realised simultaneously with large design events. Ventura Projects focuses strongly on quality, uniqueness and research, and highlights the conceptual and new expressions of international design. It is dedicated to revolutionary design trend, unpredictable creative and social concepts, emerging talents, current design products and cross disciplinary inspirations. Over 7.000 designers, brands, companies, academies and institutions exhibited via Ventura Projects.

Due to the global COVID-19 outbreak Margriet Vollenberg, founder and art director of Ventura Projects, sadly had to make the decision to stop all Ventura Projects activities.
www.venturaprojects.com
profile_positions.title: Founder & Art Director

profile_positions.description: Ventura Centrale provided a stage for brands that master the art of storytelling in the vaulted warehouses of the Milan central railway station. Through captivating installations, brands show their skills and fortitude to the design week audience. Due to the severe outbreak of COVID-19 Margriet Vollenberg, founder and art director of Ventura Projects, sadly had to make the heartbreaking decision to stop all Ventura Projects activities. Of course we will continue to work and advance international contemporary design via Organisation in Design
profile_positions.title: Art Director Ventura Centrale

profile_positions.description:
In 2016, 2017 and 2019 Ventura New York - the Dutch edition showcased the best of Dutch contemporary design talents at the fairs WantedDesign and ICFF during NYCxDESIGN week. In 3 years a total of 50 design studio's and brands joined us, and we supported them in conquering the US market by offering them a stage at these well-known American design fairs and we've created a side programme with business workshops by experts in the US design field.
Redefining what Dutch Design means today from a foreign point of view, Ventura Projects collaborates with the Consulate General of the Netherlands to offer the participating designers and companies access to the American market.
profile_positions.title: Ventura New York - the Dutch edition
